data.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: What counts in life is not the mere fact that we have lived. It is what difference we have made to the lives of others that will determine the significance of the life we lead.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Resentment is like drinking poison and then hoping it will kill your enemies.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: There is nothing like returning to a place that remains unchanged to find the ways in which you yourself have altered.
data.author: Nelson Mandela
